name: By The Numbers 1 Trivia Game | By The Numbers | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many lines in a sonnet?
How many shots were fired by Matt Dillon at the beginning of 'Gunsmoke'?
How many freckles on Howdy Doody's face?
The Declaration Of Independence was signed by how many people?
How many stitches on a regulation baseball?
What is the only even prime number?
How many years must a person be missing to be declared legally dead in the US?
At about what temperature Fahrenheit does book paper catch fire and burn?
How many justices on the U.S. Supreme Court?
